title: Heirloom Pastel Navratna Haaram with Polki Diamonds
materials: 22K Gold with Antique Finish; Natural Polki Diamonds; Navratna Gemstones including Tanzanite
features: This stunning Haaram features a unique design blending traditional Navratna elements with a modern pastel color palette. The necklace showcases intricately crafted polki diamond settings around each gemstone, creating a beautiful contrast with the antique gold finish. The central pendant boasts a statement Tanzanite cabochon, surrounded by smaller polkis. Delicate strands of freshwater pearls and emerald beads are suspended throughout the necklace, adding a touch of ethereal beauty.
occasions: and special occasions where you want to make a statement.
description: This piece offers a unique blend of traditional Navratna principles and contemporary design. The high-quality Polki diamonds, coupled with the rare pastel gemstone selection, make it a truly one-of-a-kind heirloom piece. The antique gold finish and meticulous craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and value. This is a statement piece showcasing a modern take on a timeless classic.
